name: Live Like Local
description:
Step away from the city and into the heart of village life at Thagatti Village, nestled in the serene Melagiri Hills. This 2-day, 1-night retreat offers a deeply immersive experience rooted in local stories, traditions, and community living.
Reconnect with the land and embrace the pace of rural life with:
-bamboo basket making workshop
-foraging and cooking session
- permaculture farming walk
- a sunset hike and peaceful stream dips
- a slow-paced village walk guided by Madhan, your local host and naturalist, who brings the culture to life in Hindi, English, Tamil, and Kannada.
Stay in a cozy bamboo hut, savor home-cooked farm meals, and soak in bonus seasonal experiences like a local Kannada play or village festivals, depending on the time of year.
Perfect for those seeking meaningful travel, this retreat prioritizes people over places and stories over itineraries. Limited spots. Fixed menu. Deep connection.
Contact: Vaishnavi- 8796233031

name: Intro to 3D Printing
description:
Discover how 3D printers work, explore the software needed to design 3D models, and watch the magic of 3D printing in action.

✨ What You’ll Do:
-  Learn the basics of 3D printing technology and how it works.
-  Explore the software tools used to create and prepare 3D models.
-  Watch a 3D printer in action as it brings designs to life.
-  Take home a sample print as a keepsake!
-  No prior experience is necessary. Whether you’re curious about 3D printing or looking to get started, this workshop is perfect for you! 

General rules 
-  Ages 14 and above.
-  Please bring your own Laptops (Mac/Windows/Linux is okay)
-  Contact 95132 22681 for any queries

name: Book Discussion : WATER DAYS with Sundar Sarukkai and Srikar Raghavan
description:
A community in tumultuous post-liberalization Bangalore grapples with an influx of northern immigrants and the mysterious death of Archana, a teenager involved with one of the migrants. 

Working with all the means and tools offered to a mature writer, Sundar Sarrukai depicts the overnight springing up of new neighborhoods and ways of living, new jobs, new migrations and growing tensions. We are given a sense of how untrammeled urbanization has turned the local administration rogue and uncaring. All along, men and women line up to collect water and stories in the dead of night. 

Join us to discuss the themes mentioned in this book with Sundar Sarrukai, author and Srikar Raghavan, writer and researcher.

name: Before Sunrise (1995)
description:
Join us over the long weekend for special screening of Before Sunrise (1995) and Before Sunset (2004) on Friday and Saturday night at Underline Center!

What is the Before series?

Richard Linklater’s trilogy of Before Sunrise, Before Sunset, and Before Midnight tells the heartfelt, surprising tale of the joys and pains of modern love.

The films, starring Ethan Hawke and Julie Delpy, follow the evolving relationship of Jesse and Celine over a period of 18 years. Each film is set about nine years apart, capturing different stages of their lives and relationship. It's widely considered one the greatest film trilogies, and is notable for its extensive use of dialogue, with conversations driving the narrative and exploring themes of love, time, and relationships. The films are characterized by long, intimate conversations between the main characters, which often delve into their thoughts, feelings, and philosophies.

description:

name: Manga Reading Room with Ishan
description:
We’re starting a manga library and reading room!

Come enjoy a quiet environment where you can browse and read from our collection of manga, and connect with fellow enthusiasts from the community.

If you’ve never read manga before and are just curious about the hype, this is a great place to start!

Please note: Books cannot be borrowed or taken outside the library. Since these are from a personal collection, access is limited to the duration of the event.
Who is Ishan?

Ishan is an avid manga reader, game master, and all-around fandom enthusiast. He wants more people to fall in love with the things he loves, and this event is his way of sharing his large manga collection with the community.

name: Improv Essentials: A Crash Course by Improv Lore
description:
Want to improvise but keep missing our Level 1 intensive? Learn the basics in our crash course!

We’ll take you from no performing experience to loving the stage
What we’ll cover:

    Basic stagecraft

    Trusting your ideas

    Working (playing) well with others

    Short-form improv games

    An introduction to longform improv

What you get:

    6 hours of workshop

    Access to select cast-only jams

    A discount on the next Level 1 intensive

Schedule:

Day 1: Saturday, 16th August - 11am to 2pm
Day 2: Sunday, 17th August - 11am to 2pm

name: Confessions of a Lobbyist
description: A conversation with Ramjee Chandran, Author, Journalist & Media Entrepreneur and Siddharth Raja, Senior Partner, Vertices Partners.

name: Barbet & Pals at Bar Wild
description: A spectacular new species of fun is migrating to Wild, bringing a serious altitude. Barbet and Pals will host a guest shift at Wild, featuring breathtaking themes of mountains, greens, and birds, along with cocktails so good they'll make spirits soar. Get ready for a taste of it at the Wild side. Consider this an official 'get ready to soar' notice.

name: Lyaness Bar Takeover
description: Copitas Bengaluru welcomes Lyaness Bar to Bengaluru in true Copitas style as they gear up for an unforgettable night this Wednesday at 8 PM onward. London's award-winning mixology meets Bengaluru's finest in a sparkling invitation to indulge in craft cocktails and world-class service. A blend of culture and creativity awaits at this stunning venue where the night promises to be nothing short of spectacular.

name: Ghevar Making Workshop
description: The festive season brings a unique opportunity to participate in a one-of-a-kind Ghevar Making Workshop in collaboration with Manbhavan Thalis. Participants will discover the secrets behind the golden, honeycomb-like Ghevar, Rajasthan’s most iconic dessert. This immersive experience promises not just a culinary delight but also a cultural exploration of this beloved treat. With expert guidance, attendees will learn the traditional techniques and artistry involved in crafting Ghevar, making it a memorable addition to any festive celebration.

name: Phir Bhi Quiz Hai Hindustani - India Quiz by Quiz Pro Quo
description:
From the Mughals to Modi, from traffic to the Taj, no chapters have been removed from QPQ’s India Quiz. Come prove you are the best this Friday at 5 PM

About Quiz Pro Quo?

QPQ is a community to introduce people to quizzing. They come together every week to crack questions on everyday topics. They have been hosting quizzes online and in person since May 2020.
